body:
@bradfitz Ah ok, I see, so the precompiled releases should do for building "normal" (non-bootstrap) packages?

Its also probably worth mentioning which toolchain (Xcode) one is using, as Xcode 8 beta 4 was released at the same time as OS X 10.12b4, with a new set of SDK headers. I myself am using this (latest) one.
